greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of the rational sequence with e.g.f. (x/2)*(1+exp(-x))/(1-exp(-x)).
comment: Denominator of the Bernoulli number B_n, except a(1)=1. A minor variant of the Bernoulli denominators A027642.

and the series of fractions A027641(n)/A027642(n) = B_n = 1/1, -1/2, 1/6, 0/1, -1/30.. differ only (by a sign) at n=1. The arithmetic mean of both series is 1/1, 0/1, 1/6, 0/1, -1/30,... , equal to the aerated series A000367(n)/A002445(n). The definition here provides the denominators of this series of arithmetic means.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4096
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Apr 14 2010
ext: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, May 03 2012
